<<<<<<< HEAD
A Copie of a lettre sent to preachers
[14] p.
... by Richard Grafton, Imprinted in London : the first daie of Iune in the second yere of the reigne of Our Souereign Lord Kyng Eduuard VI [1 June 1548]
Caption title: The copie of a letter sent to all those preachers, whiche the Kynges Maiestie has licensed to preache ..., the. xxiii. daie of Maie, in the seconde yere of the reigne of Our Souereigne Lord Kyng Edward the VI. Imprint from colophon. "Cum privilegio ad imprimendum solum"--Colophon. Signatures: A⁸ (last leaf blank). Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
=======
A Copie of a lettre sent to preachers
[14] p.
... by Richard Grafton, Imprinted in London : the first daie of Iune in the second yere of the reigne of Our Souereign Lord Kyng Eduuard VI [1 June 1548]
Caption title: The copie of a letter sent to all those preachers, whiche the Kynges Maiestie has licensed to preache ..., the. xxiii. daie of Maie, in the seconde yere of the reigne of Our Souereigne Lord Kyng Edward the VI. Imprint from colophon. "Cum privilegio ad imprimendum solum"--Colophon. Signatures: A⁸ (last leaf blank). Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
Richard Grafton
